name: KA Pong
description:
We are college students  who love games a lot. Hope to make games on our own. 

And this is our first mobile game. Keep trying hard to finish this game.

Hope you enjoy. 

「KA Pong」 is a pong game. 

  • We hope that you will love our character design. 
  • More and more features and secrets are on pending.
  • Find out more on your own adventure.
  • Follow us to get the latest news.

Follow us : https://www.facebook.com/Game-Starry-109356847225732

KA Pong is available on iOS and Android for free.

「Project Starry Game」

Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/Game-Starry-109356847225732

Hope you enjoy the game !!!
